purpleculture_pinyin:
huàn
to rear; to raise (animals)
сзади; выращивать (животных)
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 龹 indicates the sound; 豕 (pig) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
豢养 [ huàn yǎng ]: to keep (an animal); to look after the needs of (a person or an animal); (fig.) to keep (a spy, lackey etc) in one's pay
豢圉 [ huàn yǔ ]: pen for animals; animal barn or stable
刍豢 [ chú huàn ]: livestock; farm animals

    • 豕 [ shǐ ] pig, boar

豢字的基本解释

豢
huàn
喂养，特指喂养牲畜：豢养。

豢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huàn］
［《廣韻》胡慣切，去諫，匣。］
“圂2”的被通假字。亦作“1”。
(1)饲养牲畜。
(2)比喻收买利用。
(3)供养。
(4)贪图。
(5)食谷的牲畜。

豢字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豢； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1196第04
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡慣切，音宦。【說文】以穀圈養豕也。【廣韻】穀養畜也。【禮·月令】仲秋按芻豢。【註】養牛馬曰芻，犬豕曰豢。【疏】食草曰芻，食穀曰豢。　又餌之以利，一曰豢。【左傳·哀十一年】吳將伐齊，越子率其衆以朝，王及列士皆有餽賂，子胥懼，曰：是豢吳也夫。【註】豢，養也。　又官名。【左傳·昭二十九年】董父擾畜龍，以服事帝舜，帝賜之姓曰董，氏曰豢龍。【註】豢龍，官名。以官爲氏。　又【集韻】通作圂。【禮·少儀】君子不食圂腴。【註】圂，同豢。　又【韻會】亦作㹖。【莊子·達生篇】祝宗人說彘曰：汝奚惡死，吾將三月㹖汝。　又【集韻】戸管切，音緩。義同。　又叶胡玩切，音換。【曹植·孔甲贊】行有順天，龍有河漢。雌雄各一，是擾是豢。　又叶熒絹切，緣去聲。【歐陽修·讀書詩】淡泊味愈長，始終殊不變。庶幾垂後世，不默死芻豢。　【說文】本从豕?，手執米以養之，指事也。隷省作豢。《說文》本从豕?作?。

豢字的源字形

豢字的起名意思

意为喂养，饲养。

Basic explanation of words
rear
huàn
Feeding, especially feeding livestock: feeding.
rear
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huàn］
["Guangyun" Hu used to cut, go to admonish, box. ]
"圂2" was passed the false character. Also known as "1".
(1) Raising livestock.
(2) It is a metaphor for buying and using.
(3) Provide support.
(4) Covetousness.
(5) Grain-eating livestock.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Concentration】【Wu Character Department】　豢; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1196 No. 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Hu used to cut, Yinhuan. [Said the text] Raising hogs in captivity in Yigu. [Guang Yun] Gu raises livestock. 【Rite·Moon Order】Zhongqiu presses the humble. [Note] Raising cattle and horses is called cuddling, and dog hogs are called hogs. 【Sparse】grass-eating is called cuddle, and eating grain is called hog.　The bait is for profit, and the other is 豢. [Zuo Zhuan·Eleventh Year of Amour] Wu generals defeated Qi, Yue Zi led the others to court, kings and scholars all had gifts, Zi Xu was afraid, and said: It is Wu Yefu. [Note] You can raise it.　Also official name. [Zuo Chuan·29th year] Dong's father disturbed the animal dragon to serve Emperor Shun. The surname given by the emperor was Dong, and the family was called the dragon. [Note] Poison dragon, official name. Take the official as the clan　[Jiyun] All the same. [Rite·Shaoyi] Gentlemen don’t eat gluttony. [Note] 圂, the same as 豢.　[Rhyme will] also make 㹖. [Zhuangzi·Dasheng Chapter] Zong Zhu said: If you die, I will die in March.　 [Ji Yun] cut through the pipe, the sound is slow. The same meaning.　 Ye Hu played and cut, and the sound changed. [Cao Zhi·Kong Jiazan] There is Shuntian in travel, and He and Han in dragon. One male and one female, it's a disturbance or a mess.　 Ye Ying cut the silk again, the fate is gone. 【Ouyang Xiu·Reading Poems】The longer the indifferent taste, the more it will remain the same. The concubine hangs down for a few future generations, and does not die silently.　【Said the text】This is from the hog? Administer the province as a clan. "Said Wen" was originally written from the pig.
